pages.text: The $(item)Purifier$() is basically a washing basin... but of the arcane kind. As the name implies, it purifies materials and may grant interesting results. $(br)I should be aware that during purification, material tends to dissolve, meaning that the Purifier often requires greater amounts of material to purificate. $(marked)Three$() essences should be enough.
$(o)The first dishwasher that does not start to smell bad$()
